typeSystemDescription.name: PADSiteAndTerm
typeSystemDescription.description: Represents Term and Location entities required for PAD project.

featureDescription.name: hitDictionaryValue
featureDescription.description: Value from the Dictionary that was successfully looked up

featureDescription.name: isStandAlone
featureDescription.description:
Identifies weather this term needs another dictionary hit to be considered as a valid hit. Currently this is being used for Unstable Angina which requires "Term" and "Location" to be present in the text to be considered as a valid hit.
Valid values are 0 and 1. Where, 0 is false (not standalone) and 1 is true (is standalone)

featureDescription.name: relatedTokens
featureDescription.description: identifies the token that this PADTerm spans
